course.subject: PMA
course.course_title: Costume History: From Fig Leaf to Vanity
course.class_descr: Cost Hist Fig Leaf To Vanity

notes.note: Prerequisite: Taught in English, with reading options in English or German. Some ability to read music. Students with no experience in reading music (playing an instrument) are encouraged to enroll concurrently in the one-credit course MUSIC 1100. A section in German will be available for 1 extra credit (GERST 3601).
